head.title: Next generation hybrid consensus public chain
head.keyword: True，TrueChain，Eric zhang，blockchain, hybrid consensus, Xiaoyong Cheng, Larry Lin
head.description: TrueChain is the first public chain in the world which brings about the technology of hybrid consensus combining PBFT and POW. It solves the biggest problem confronting public blockchain: the contradiction between decentralization and efficiency.

home.slogan: Truly Fast, Permissionless, Secure and Scalable
home.slogan1: PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus public blockchain with global developer community

superiority.title: Tackles the Obstacles of Public Blockchain
superiority.detail: The conflict between  efficiency and decentralization for public blockchain is solved by TrueChain with its permissionless PBFT-fPoW hybrid consensus with secure sharding.

superiority.title: Ensures  Decentralization and Fairness
superiority.detail: Using Fruitchain as Snailchain to replace Nakamoto PoW with fPoW, TrueChain ensures  decentralization and fairness for the new generation of public blockchain.

superiority.title: The First  Hybrid Consensus Incentive Model
superiority.detail: TrueChain is the first in the world to design an incentive model for the governance of the hybrid consensus which impart economic awareness to blockchain technology

superiority.title: Stable and Low Gas Fee Mechanism
superiority.detail: Zero gas fee is impossible for public blockchain, nonetheless, TrueChain designs a stable and relatively low gas fee mechanism for more DApps to be built on it.

superiority.title: Strong Global Developer Community
superiority.detail: Among the new generation of public blockchains, TrueChain has a developer community that is the largest in China and the fastest growing in the world.

superiority.title: Open Sourced Grid of Products
superiority.detail: TrueChain brings a grid of products that support the hybrid consensus public blockchain platform and makes the chain easy to use, and they are open source!

about.title: ABOUT
about.subhead: TrueChain is a truly fast, permissionless, secure and scalable public blockchain platform which is supported by hybrid consensus technology called Minerva and a global developer community.
contentList: Many public chains based on single consensus mechanism such as PoW or PoS, are having a bottleneck in efficiency. One the other hand, those based on dPoS or dBFT have been improved in efficiency, but are having problems in decentralization. TrueChain uses hybrid consensus called Minerva combining PBFT and fPoW to solve the biggest problem confronting public blockchain: the contradiction between decentralization and efficiency.

It uses PBFT as fast-chain to process transactions, and leave the oversight and election of PBFT to the hands of  PoW nodes. Besides, TrueChain integrates fruitchain technology into the traditional PoW protocol  i.e. fPoW, as the snailchain, to make the chain even more decentralized and fair. TrueChain also added sharding on top of PBFT to lift the limit of scalability.

With solid and leading technology, TrueChain aims to provide a workable and well-governed blockchain platform for decentralized economy. It comes up with the first hybrid consensus incentive model to use economic awareness as a drive to uphold and improve the chain. Meanwhile, it also creates a stable gas fee mechanism to lower the cost for the developers and operators of DApps, and to make the blockchain more public.

As a platform, TrueChain builds an all-inclusive community to attract the worldwide developers and entrepreneurs to be part of it, to join the decentralized economy revolution. Not only TrueChain has a global developer community, it also has a  grid of products that are handy for the developers, and they are open sourced which allows them to be more user oriented.
The team of TrueChain is international with its members from India, the United States, China, etc.

events: Stellar-the platform to deploy and manage the full life cycle of smart contracts released
TrueChain’s engineering roadmap released on github
TrueChain’s election system for decentralized nodes released

fPOW basic framework complete and open source
TrueChain mainnet launch （only open to priority nodes）

head.title: TrueChain recruitment website
head.keyword: TrueChain, TRUE, recruitment website,blockchain, blockchain employee, digital currency
head.description: TrueChain welcome more people come to join us.

join.title: JOIN US
join.intro: Welcome the creative, passionate and sincere you to join us, Sail with us!
join.p1: Once you join us, you will get training while working. You will benefit from the accumulated professional experience from us. Join us and you will be added in the TrueChain employee career development training program.
join.p2: Training is not only a requirement for the continuous improvement and development of each employee's quality and potential, but also an important process to achieve the company’s success.

jobs.title: Go development engineer
duty: Use Go language to design and develop the TrueChain product.
Participate in the software architecture design of the blockchain platform, study the key technologies of the blockchain infrastructure.
Responsible for development related to blockchain core layer (transaction, message, virtual machine EVM).
Work closely with product/design/front-end development/test team, deliver blockchain development tasks on time
Other works arranged by senior leadership
require: Have more than 2 years’ experience in project development;
Familiar with golang language programming, master multithreading;
Experienced in high load, high concurrent development design is preferred;
Have solid computer programming capabilities, especially skilled in the data structure, algorithms and code, software design ;
Familiar with the fabric or Ethereum development.

jobs.title: Investor Relations Director
jobs.requireNum: 2 people (one based in the United States, fluent in English speaking and writing)
duty: Responsible for the maintenance of institutional investor relations, directs and organizes meet-up for the mainstream Blockchain Foundation in China and the United States, and negotiate potential cooperation.
require: Familiar with the blockchain investment field, can prepare relevant materials and investment proposals .
Financial related background, FA background or public listed company fundraising and private fund raising background, financial technology industry
Flexibility and integrity, bold in both thinking and action, can quickly learn the basic knowledge and the market structure of the blockchain .
jobs.salary: Basic salary about 30,000 plus commission (linked to the volume of fund-raising, holding time, fund visibility, etc.)

head.title: TrueChain priority nodes election
head.keyword: TrueChain,TRUE, nodes election, super nodes, blockchain, digital currency
head.description: TrueChain will select no more than 4000 priority standard nodes (POW) and no more than 100 priority master nodes (PBFT+POW) by votes before the test main network released in September.
